alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 21 at 4:53AM AKDT until July 21 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING NEAR TURNAGAIN PASS... * WHAT...Visibility of a quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Along Seward Highway from Hope Highway to Portage, including Turnagain Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog of a quarter mile or less was reported on the Seward Highway from the Hope Highway junction, through Turnagain Pass, to Portage. Sudden drops in visibility are possible through mountain valleys. Fog should lift as the sun rises later this morning.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
